name: Maze of Disorder
description:
After an unexpected accident you find yourself in a new reality consumed in chaos where the laws of physics are broken. Lost and desperate you need to find a way back...

Will you be able to escape from this randomly generated maze?

Controls:

WASD: move around.

Esc: exit game.

Programming and art by Willixwolf.

Music and SFX by AARV MUSIC.

This game was made for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2.
